Html:
Long time ago author asked for logo\icon creation. So i decided to try and sent him email

to cnervig@hotmail.com
date18 June 2010 15:34

no answer, no answer, no answer... so i've sent from another mail

to cnervig@hotmail.com
date 28 August 2010 18:14

same result.

Anyone can tell me do rawr still needs new logo? I dont really care that much, but i do regret wasted time...

I don't recall seeing any emails about a logo and not responding to them... I can check my junk mail, will do that. Regardless, the logo stuff ended months ago. I'll certainly take a look anyway though.
